multiple-choice.question: What is the primary purpose of the TED-Ed website?

options.label: A
options.text: To provide a platform for TED Talks

options.label: B
options.text: To offer educational resources for teachers and students

options.label: C
options.text: To host a library of animated educational videos

options.label: D
options.text: To facilitate online discussions and forums

multiple-choice.question: What is the main difference between the "Series" view and the "Subject" view on the TED-Ed library?

options.label: A
options.text: The "Series" view is for browsing videos thematically, while the "Subject" view is for finding videos based on specific topics

options.label: B
options.text: The "Series" view is for teachers, while the "Subject" view is for learners

options.label: C
options.text: The "Series" view is for browsing videos based on their own curiosity, while the "Subject" view is for finding videos to show in class

options.label: D
options.text: The "Series" view is for browsing videos by location, while the "Subject" view is for finding videos by subject

multiple-choice.question: What is the purpose of the "Quick Quiz" section in a TED-Ed lesson?

options.label: A
options.text: To provide additional resources for exploring the topic

options.label: B
options.text: To offer open-answer questions for students to answer

options.label: C
options.text: To check for basic comprehension of the video and provide real-time feedback

options.label: D
options.text: To allow students to track their own learning across the site

multiple-choice.question: What is the benefit of flipping a lesson on the TED-Ed website?

options.label: A
options.text: It allows you to edit each of the lesson's sections, including the title, instructions, and questions

options.label: B
options.text: It provides a unique URL for measuring the progress of any learner you share it with

options.label: C
options.text: It allows you to add your own resources or questions to the lesson

options.label: D
options.text: All of the above

multiple-choice.question: What is a unique feature of the TED-Ed platform?

options.label: A
options.text: It allows you to create a lesson around any TED Talk or TEDx Talk

options.label: B
options.text: It provides a library of animated educational videos on YouTube

options.label: C
